overview:
Jason is currently Principal and co-founder of Global Thinking, a creative agency based in Washington, DC (http://www.globalthinking.com).

Jason spent most of his early career (1995-2006) at TeleGeography, a market research and consulting firm specializing in telecommunications services and internet infrastructure. As President of the company, Jason was responsible for building the business from start-up to globally-known brand with customers in 100+ countries.

Jason continued to lead TeleGeography as it was sold twice, first to internet exchange Band-X in 2000 and then to consultancy PriMetrica in 2003.

Following his departure from TeleGeography in 2006, Jason joined the UK-based consulting firm Analysys. After setting up a US team and organizing the company’s first US acquisition, Jason left Analysys to start Global Thinking.

Jason has worked as an advisor to dozens of major technology firms, including AT&T, Cisco, Google, Sprint, and Verizon. Mr. Kowal holds an honors B.A. degree from Tufts University.
